```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## read in some data

read in the litters dataset.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

## Take a look at the data

printing in the console.

```{r}
litters_df
```

```{r}
head(litters_df)
```

```{r}
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```
